member.summary: Sets the filter into the control.
member.param: State of the filter.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.DataGrid.Filters.DataGridComboBoxTextFilter.ItemsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of items that will be used to built the list of matching values.
